column4: I have problem, I just installed new display card(Geforce FX 5200), I want to install edgy but it always hang, it said kernel panic, but if I unplug it and use old display the installer working good, I can install and run windows XP with FX5200, please help

I have problem, I just installed new display card(Geforce FX 5200), I want to install edgy but it always hang, it said kernel panic, but if I unplug it and use old display the installer working good, I can install and run windows XP with FX5200, any experience, please help

I have problem, I just installed new display card(Geforce FX 5200), I want to install edgy but it always hang, it said kernel panic, but if I unplug it and use old display the installer working good, I can install and run windows XP with FX5200, any experience, please help
maybe start ubuntu  in graphic safe mode
it's same result eventhough I use safemode, it hang after last line "EIP is at Clear_local..."
